body:
I have a fix somewhere. We'd need significant work to get the code correct
under that sanitizer, and I'm not convinced it's worth a concentrated
effort just yet.

On Wed, Aug 3, 2016, 10:52 AM Nicolas Noble notifications@github.com
wrote:

> Defining GRPC_EXECUTION_CONTEXT_SANITIZER won't compile exec_ctx.c
> anymore, as enough changed in the closure structure that it won't compile
> anymore.
> 
> Suggest moving that define to CONFIG=dbg so we can make sure this code
> isn't left dead.
> 
> â€”
